name: unwrinkled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of skin) without any small lines because of old age: The skin around her eyes was smooth and unwrinkled. Even in his forties, his face was still young and unwrinkled.
(of cloth) without any small lines or folds in it: The sheets on the bed were still fresh and unwrinkled. She looked immaculate in an unwrinkled black suit. Opposite
wrinkled
More examplesFewer examplesHis face looked calm and unwrinkled.Considering her age, she had remarkably clear and unwrinkled skin.After such a difficult journey, there was little chance of arriving at the meeting with my clothes unwrinkled.
